description: This name is given to a stop invented by Wolfgang Oberlinger and patented in 1997 by the firm of Oberlinger Orgelbau of Windesheim, Germany. According Oberlinger's web site, it is intended to replace a 16' Subbass, but requires only about 1/7 as much space, about 0.13 cubic meters. The illustration from Oberlinger's patent application is reproduced below (click on it for a larger image), followed by a translation of the patent's abstract.
